title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-1.7 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-1.7 - Introduction

State Regulations

The terms used throughout this Subchapter are defined
in this Part. The Part also contains matters of general information for the
guidance of local agencies in connection with procedures, the fiscal year, bonding, reporting, budgeting, tax exemptions, regulations governing traveling
expenses, ineligible expenditures, etc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1640-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
